name: Subnuggets
description:
It's subnugget season and you came to harvest as much as you can. 

Equipped with your bubblegun, you are ready to feed and reap.

Show these creatures you can play around with bubbles and they will reward you with all the beans you need.

Remember to return to your base once you have some loot, it would be a pity to run out of air with beans in your pockets.

Good Luck!

A short game made for Ludum Dare 52 with the theme "Harvest"
